name: Nocte Domum DEMO
description:
The player will take the role of Damien, a 20 year old man suffering from hallucinations and amnesia.
Damien looks for a psychologist that can help him.But he will have to get in his own mind by the method of hypnosis and find the answer to all of his questions. 

  • A horror game that mix the old school puzzle solving and back-tracking level design with the modern horror games` FPS mechanics, hide and seek tension and disturbing visuals. 
  • No jumpscares, just pure tension and erieness. 
  • Feel the true fear through the original chilling-bone soundtrack. 
  • No stock-unity assests, all the models are original and made to increase atmosphere.
  • No holding hand, the game will be as hard as old school survival horror titles.
